00001 /* 
00002  * Jamoma RampUnit: async
00003  * Asyncronuous ramping driven by bangs passed to module (hub) 
00004  * or Max messages passed to leftmost signal inlet.
00005  *
00006  * By Trond Lossius, (c) 2007
00007  * 
00008  * License: This code is licensed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
00009  * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html 
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include "Jamoma.h"
00013 #include "async.h"
00014 
00015 
00016 t_async*        create(rampunit_method_callback_type in_callback, void *in_baton)
00017 {
00018         t_async *rampunit = (t_async *)malloc(sizeof(t_async));
00019         if(rampunit){
00020                 rampunit->callback = in_callback;
00021                 rampunit->baton = in_baton;
00022                 rampunit->value_current = NULL;
00023                 rampunit->value_target = NULL;
00024                 rampunit->value_start = NULL;
00025                 rampunit->numvalues = 0;
00026                 rampunit->function = NULL;
00027                 rampunit->functionName = NULL;
00028                 setnumvalues(rampunit, 1);
00029                 rampunit->value_current[0] = 0;
00030                 rampunit->active = 0;           
00031                 setFunction(rampunit, gensym("linear"));
00032         }
00033         return rampunit;
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 void destroy(t_async *rampunit)
00038 {
00039         free(rampunit->value_current);
00040         free(rampunit->value_target);
00041         free(rampunit->value_start);
00042         if(rampunit->function)
00043                 delete rampunit->function;
00044         free(rampunit);
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 JamomaError setFunction(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol *functionName)
00049 {
00050         JamomaError     err = JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00051         if(functionName != rampunit->functionName){
00052                 err = jamoma_getFunction(functionName, &rampunit->function);
00053                 if(!err){
00054                         rampunit->functionName = functionName;
00055                 }
00056         }
00057         return err;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 JamomaError getFunction(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol **functionName)
00062 {
00063         *functionName = rampunit->functionName;
00064         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 JamomaError setFunctionParameter(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00069 {
00070         return rampunit->function->setParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 JamomaError getFunctionParameter(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00075 {
00076         return rampunit->function->getParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00077 }

00080 ramp_err attrset(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00081 {
00082         return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 ramp_err attrget(t_async *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00087 {
00088         return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00089 }

00091 
00092 void go(t_async *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values, double time)
00093 {
00094         short i;
00095         
00096         rampunit->ramptime              = time;
00097         rampunit->time_start    = systime_ms();
00098         rampunit->time_target   = rampunit->time_start + time;
00099 
00100         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00101         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++){
00102                 rampunit->value_target[i] = values[i];
00103                 rampunit->value_start[i] = rampunit->value_current[i];
00104         }
00105         rampunit->value = 0.0;                                                  // set the ramp to the beginning
00106         rampunit->active = 1;           
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 void set(t_async *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values)
00111 {
00112         short i;
00113         
00114         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00115         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++)
00116                 rampunit->value_current[i] = values[i];
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 void stop(t_async *rampunit)
00121 {
00122         // Nada.        
00123         rampunit->active=0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 void tick(t_async *rampunit)
00128 {
00129         unsigned long   current_time = systime_ms();
00130         short                   i;
00131         double                  mapped;
00132         double                  *current = rampunit->value_current;
00133         double                  *target = rampunit->value_target;
00134         double                  *start = rampunit->value_start;
00135         float                   ratio;
00136         
00137         if (rampunit->active)
00138         {
00139                 if(current_time > rampunit->time_target){
00140                         rampunit->active = 0;
00141                         for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00142                                 rampunit->value_current[i] = rampunit->value_target[i];
00143                 }
00144                 else{
00145                         ratio = (current_time - rampunit->time_start) / (float)rampunit->ramptime;
00146                         mapped = rampunit->function->mapValue(ratio);
00147                         for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00148                                 current[i] = (target[i] * mapped) + (start[i] * (1 - mapped));
00149                 }
00150                 (rampunit->callback)(rampunit->baton, rampunit->numvalues, rampunit->value_current);            // send the value to the host
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 // PRIVATE METHOD: memory allocation
00156 void setnumvalues(t_async *rampunit, short numvalues)
00157 {
00158         if(numvalues != rampunit->numvalues){
00159                 if(rampunit->numvalues == 0){
00160                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00161                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00162                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00163                 }
00164                 else{
00165                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_current, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00166                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_target, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00167                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_start, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00168                 }
00169                 rampunit->numvalues = numvalues;
00170         }       
00171 }
